ch.nolix.common.container

Class Matrix<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.common.container.Matrix<E>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContainer<E>, Clearable, java.lang.Iterable<E>

    public final class Matrix<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements IContainer<E>
    A matrix is a container that stores its elements like a table.
